en.heading: Unlock the Power of Smart Forests
en.paragraph1: When faced with the greatest global threat of the 21st century, nothing short of large-scale, immediate action will do. It’s time to value forests for more than just a single tree and harness their power to clean our air, purify our waters and protect our wildlife, all while creating green jobs for generations to come.
en.paragraph2: CFT sees the forest despite the trees. We are harnessing the power of Smart Forests™ – a nature-based solution with meaningful, measurable impacts.
en.card1: A Canadian owned and operated company with roots in New Brunswick
en.card2: A mission to build 10 million acres of Smart Forests™ across Canada by 2040
en.card3: An accessible, easy, nature-based solution to combat climate change
en.buildbutton: Build your forest with Canada’s Forest Trust
en.smartpara: Smart Forests™ are built by individuals, families, schools and corporations – they are customizable, inclusive and achievable in every province and territory in Canada.
en.card1para: A turnkey & sustainable solution to meet ESG needs
en.card2para: An engaging & tangible way for schools and students to combat climate change
en.card3para: A unique way to leave a healthy planet for future generations
en.card4para: An opportunity for every Canadian to participate
en.powerpara: Smart Forests™ build a more resilient and biodiverse Canada, clean our air and waterways and sequester millions of tons of carbon dioxide every year. With strategic and purposful planting, preserving and protecting, Smart Forests™ have the power to be natural climate solutions by upholding the integrity of our planet, for generations to come.
en.unlockbutton: Unlock the power of Smart Forests™
en.buildpara: Canada’s Forest Trust engages and empowers youth, families, farmers, landowners, Indigenous communities and corporate Canada to work together to build a more resilient environment and meet our country’s global commi™ent to a net-zero future.
en.portalpara: CFT provides 24/7 access to an exclusive client portal that offers a number of options to engage with the progress of their Smart Forests ™ growth as they measure and track its impact on the environment, economy and society. This forest learning hub will help you navigate how your Smart Forests ™ are growing a cleaner, greener and more resilient Canada.
en.calculatepara: Try our unparalleled calculator software to see what your impact could look like!
en.step1para: Calculate how much carbon your corporation must offset to reach net-zero.
en.step2para: Calculate how much carbon your corporation must offset to reach net-zero.
en.step3para: Calculate how much carbon your corporation must offset to reach net-zero.

fr.heading: Ne plantez plus jamais un seul arbre.
fr.paragraph1: Face à la plus grande menace mondiale du 21e siècle, rien de moins qu'une action immédiate à grande échelle fera l'affaire. Il est temps de valoriser les forêts pour plus qu’un seul arbre et d’exploiter leur pouvoir pour assainir notre air, purifier nos eaux et protéger notre faune, tout en créant des emplois verts pour les générations à venir.
fr.paragraph2: CFT sees the forest despite the trees. We are harnessing the power of Smart Forests™ – a nature-based solution with meaningful, measurable impacts.

fr.card2: A mission to build 10 million acres of Smart Forests™ across Canada by 2040
